title: Dark Class: Bonus Epilogue
description: Join Ellie and the rest of the Earth women, their partners, and the Class 5s on Larga Ways for a reunion that will make more than a few members of the UC uncomfortable. Dark Class: Bonus Epilgoue is a 14K word novella.This free bonus epilogue to DARK CLASS, book 5 in the Class 5 series.
author: Michelle Diener
